public_cloud_beta_warning_subtitle: Explore the preview version of the Public Cloud
public_cloud_beta_warning_test_new_featu: You have early access to our brand-new management interface for managing your Public Cloud projects.
public_cloud_beta_warning_help_develop: Help us develop the Public Cloud
public_cloud_beta_warning_help_develop_d: By using the Public Cloud preview version and sharing your feedback with us (using the button in the bottom right-hand corner of the OVH Control Panel), you can help us improve its features.
public_cloud_beta_warning_comment: It isn’t perfect yet, and we’re aware that there are a few ‘ bugs ’ but have fun, test it out, and share your thoughts!
